reviewText: It was supposed to be both films. Couldn't get "Reefer Madness"  to view.

I didn't get the double feature.  Only "Sex Madness" was available.  So I ended up buying two versions of "Reefer Madness." (One was colorized as I discovered who when I watched it and the other is the original black and white version.). If this wasn't a double feature it shouldn't have been advertised as such.  Also, if a black and white film has been colorized this should be noted on the film information.
Claims to be a collection but only has sex madness and not reefer madness
It's not the collection. It only included sex madness.

There are two serious movies in their day on the CD.  By today's standardsthey are very funny.  movie theaters near my campus would sometimes run these as a double bill.  Until video recorders the only way to get them was to buy the film.  i've always wanted a copy of these films.

Sex Madness is about the evils of sex outside of marriage, contracting venerial diseases and being ripped off by quack doctors.  A look at burlesque shows with its easy women.  Men going to see prostitutes and the ease of contracting an STD.  A woman having sex before marriage and how her STD hurt her, her husband and her new infant.  No mention of using a condom to prevent contracting STDs.  An emphasis on no sex outside of marriage.

Reefer Madness is on the evils of using marijuana.  The film uses fear of being out of control and the horrid things you could end up doing.  An innocent young woman is tricked into attending a reefer party.  She is coerced into trying marijana.  After this day her life changes forever.  Very funny by today's standards.
When I rented this video, I thought that I would be getting Refer Madness. Sex Madness, though amusing, is not why I paid for this, but that is all that was on the video stream.
This movie was hilarious!!!  I almost can't believe this is how our grandparents got down!!! This was very informitive they should show this in schools!!!
